uber

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • uber.RequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<Driver>, Subject

    public class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<Driver>, Subject
    Handles Uber requests; is responsible for choosing an appropriate driver for the User who sent the Request. Signals Observers when something changes in the system.
    Author:
    FaithChan
